00032 int pciClass::store_db (void)
00033 {
00034   vector<pciSubclass*>::iterator iter_sub;
00035   vector<pciProgif*>::iterator iter_prog;
00036 
00037   pciSubclass* tmp_sub;
00038   pciProgif* tmp_prog;
00039 
00040   const string host_url("localhost");
00041   const string user("root");
00042   const string pass("password");
00043   const string database("harix_db");
00044   string class_code, class_name, subclass_code, subclass_name, prog_code, prog_name;
00045 
00046   // Could be better with MySQL Prepared Statement
00047   // but it's buggy operating with Stored Procedures at the moment
00048   try{
00049     sql::Driver* driver = get_driver_instance();
00050     std::auto_ptr<sql::Connection> connector( driver->connect(host_url, user, pass) );
00051     connector->setSchema(database);
00052     std::auto_ptr<sql::Statement> stmt(connector->createStatement());
00053 
00054     class_code = "\"" + get_code() + "\"" ;
00055     class_name = "\"" + get_name() + "\"";
00056     stmt->execute("CALL sp_pciClassesAdd("+ class_code + "," + class_name + ")");
00057     throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00058     // std::cout << class_code << " - " << class_name << std::endl;                         // @test
00059 
00060     for( iter_sub = kid_list.begin(); iter_sub != kid_list.end(); ++iter_sub ){
00061       tmp_sub = *iter_sub;
00062       subclass_code = "\"" + tmp_sub->get_code() + "\"" ;
00063       subclass_name = "\"" + tmp_sub->get_name() + "\"";
00064       stmt->execute("CALL sp_pciSubClassesAdd("+ class_code + "," + subclass_code + "," + subclass_name + ")");
00065       throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00066       // std::cout << '\t' << subclass_code << " - " << subclass_name << std::endl;         // @test
00067 
00068       if( (tmp_sub->progif_list).size() == 0  ){
00069         prog_code =  "null" ;
00070         prog_name =  "null" ;
00071         stmt->execute("CALL sp_pciProgifsAdd("+ class_code + "," + subclass_code + "," + prog_code +  "," + prog_name + ")");
00072         throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00073         // std::cout << '\t' << '\t' << prog_code << " " << prog_name << std::endl;//@test
00074         continue;
00075       }
00076       for( iter_prog = (tmp_sub->progif_list).begin(); iter_prog != (tmp_sub->progif_list).end(); ++iter_prog ){
00077           tmp_prog = *iter_prog;
00078           prog_code =  "\"" + tmp_prog->get_code() + "\"" ;
00079           prog_name =  "\"" + tmp_prog->get_name() + "\"" ;
00080           stmt->execute("CALL sp_pciProgifsAdd("+ class_code + "," + subclass_code + "," + prog_code +  "," + prog_name +")");
00081           throw_call_garbage(stmt.get());
00082           // std::cout << '\t' << '\t' << prog_code << " " << prog_name << std::endl;//@test
00083         }
00084     }
00085   }
00086   catch (sql::SQLException &e) {
00087     /*
00088       The MySQL Connector/C++ throws three different exceptions:
00089       - sql::MethodNotImplementedException (derived from sql::SQLException)
00090       - sql::InvalidArgumentException (derived from sql::SQLException)
00091       - sql::SQLException (derived from std::runtime_error)
00092     */
00093     std::cout << "# ERR: SQLException in " << __FILE__;
00094     std::cout << "(" << __FUNCTION__ << ") on line " << __LINE__ << std::endl;
00095     /* Use what() (derived from std::runtime_error) to fetch the error message */
00096     std::cout << "# ERR: " << e.what();
00097     std::cout << " (MySQL error code: " << e.getErrorCode();
00098     std::cout << ", SQLState: " << e.getSQLState() << " )" << std::endl;
00099 
00100     return 1;
00101   }
00102 
00103   return 0;
00104 }
00105 
00106 // Throw the unneeded result returned from the CALL to the SP
00107 static void throw_call_garbage(sql::Statement* normal_stmt)
00108 {
00109   std::auto_ptr< sql::ResultSet > res;
00110   do {
00111     res.reset(normal_stmt->getResultSet());
00112     while (res->next()) {
00113 #ifdef DEBUG
00114       std::cout << res->getInt(1) << " -> expected value is 0" << std::endl;
00115 #endif
00116     }
00117   } while (normal_stmt->getMoreResults());
00118 }

00120 pciClass::~pciClass()
00121 {
00122   int subclass_list_size = kid_list.size();
00123 
00124   for ( int k=0; k<subclass_list_size; k++ ){
00125     delete kid_list.back();
00126     kid_list.pop_back();
00127   }
00128 
00129 }

00131 pciSubclass::~pciSubclass()
00132 {
00133   int progif_list_size = progif_list.size();
00134 
00135   for (int k=0; k < progif_list_size; k++){
00136     delete progif_list.back();
